hero.title: Hotel with a Thousand Stars
hero.subtitle: An autobiographical journey through Europe, the Middle East, and Africa in search of freedom and connection.

introduction.label: About the book
introduction.title: A story about life in an unknown world, without certainty and without guarantee of a good outcome.
introduction.paragraph1: Hotel with a Thousand Stars is an autobiographical tale about a young man on the path to adulthood, driven by a desire for freedom and connection. The story opens with a conversation between a father and son on another planet, in which the son asks to incarnate on Earth. This conversation forms the spiritual starting point of a life in an unknown world, without certainty and without guarantee of a good outcome.
introduction.paragraph2: The book describes an open, sometimes raw existence along the edges of societies and through different countries and cultures, where survival, work, street music and encounters shape the days.

author.label: Author
author.name: Louis Henderiks
author.title: I'm Louis Henderiks, the author of 'Hotel with a Thousand Stars'.
author.bio: Louis Henderiks (1961) spent a long time traveling. Later, he settled in Groningen. Writing came later, after his father passed away. Hotel with a Thousand Stars is his literary debut.
